A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Rian Johnson tried too hard to make the \"The Last Jedi\" into a proper disney movie\, focusing heavily on humor which appears to be directet at a younger audience then befor.\nThe general theme of \"let the past die\" was taken quite literal and resulted sadly more then once in a character end which seemed either rushed or just plain lazy.\nI still enjoy it as an addition to the Starwars sage\, but sadly it was not the sequel I was looking for.
